item.title: I-10 East - I-110/US-54 Jct.
item.description: I-10 east at I-110/US-54 ramps. Use left lane for US-54 East/Alamogordo/Ft. Bliss; use right lane for (I-110 South/US-54 West)Juarez Mexico. Notice that firearms are prohibited in Mexico.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 22B
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22B - US-54/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo (NM)/Fort Bliss/Juarez (Mexico). Continue east on I-10 for San Antonio and Van Horn.

item.title: I-10 East - Exits 22A and 22B
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22A - TX-478 Loop/Copia St. Approaching Exit 22B - US-54/Alamogordo (NM)/Fort Bliss/Juarez (Mexico). Continue east on I-10 for San Antonio and Van Horn.

item.title: I-10 West at I-110/US-54 Ramps
item.description: I-10 west at I-110/US-54 ramps. Merge right for US-54 North/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo/Fort Bliss. Merge left for (I-110/US-54 South)/Juárez, Mexico. Also use I-110/US-54 south for Chamizal Coliseum. Notice the sign above the Juárez, Mexico signs that shows firearms are not allowed in Mexico.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 22B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 22B - US-54/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo/Fort Bliss/Juárez. I-10 continues west to Las Cruces (New Mexico).

item.title: I-110/US-54 North at I-10
item.description: I-110/US-54 North at I-10/US-180 jct. Merge left for US-54 North/Alamogordo (NM), and I-10/US-180 West/Downtown/Las Cruces (NM). Merge right for I-10(not-signed)/US-180 East/Van Horn/San Antonio. This is the northern end of I-110.
